title: Pope John Paul II and role of church

content.prompt: Pope John Paul II (elected 1978) did which of the following?

choices.label: Reversed the Second Vatican Council's outreach to other religions.
Liberalized Roman Catholic teachings regarding birth control and abortion.
Supported the Solidarity labor movement in Poland.
Embraced capitalism as a means to human freedom.
Promoted women to positions of leadership in the Roman Catholic Church.

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
